VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: herald of the black hive
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: A cultist that attunes his psycasts to these dangerous, mechanoid-fighting insects.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: The Black Hive was created as the ultimate mechanoid killers. A hive of highly intelligent and specialized insectoids with an intense hatred for mechanical creations. A herald of the Black Hive venerates these insects and has honed his psychic skills to acquire some of their power for his own.

VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: oculist
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: A disciple of the All Seeing Eye that lies beyond the veil of madness.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: A blasphemous, hellish darkness made of equal parts madness and iniquity awaits us beyond the veil. By tapping into this obscene extra-dimensional power oculists acquire powers beyond imagining.

VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: xeno-seer
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: A psychic exo-biologist specialized in tapping into the strange abilities of genetically modified fauna.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: Equal parts psycaster and scientist, the xeno-seer dedicates their entire willpower to meditating and studying the intricate survival abilities developed and engineered on the strange creatures that populate the Rim.

VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.label: ravager
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: An animalistic berserker that invokes the rage of the wild to strike his enemies in brutal, close quarters combat.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: Warriors of great strength, ravager user their psychic abilities to attune themselves to animal spirits, acquiring their power to fight in a trance-like fury where they leave their humanity behind.
